title: Ex OCC ADC LF Team.
body:
LF a competitive new Roster, To play along side. I'll Also Sub for any Team as an AD.
Ign: Minigorophin
Can Practice freely as i'm just at Tafe.

replies.body: Add me in game, Might have a sub AD Spot for you, might need you in the upcoming finals of a tourney. Not as high level team you might be used to but still high plat - diamond. IGN PGN Miracle
